title: Altar (God Wars Dungeon)

properties.name: description
properties.value: There are five altars in the God Wars Dungeon, near every general.

content:
There are five altars in the God Wars Dungeon, near every general.

Each of these altars can recharge prayer points every 10 minutes, which also gives a +1 prayer bonus for every piece of equipment affiliated to the correct deity. An exception to this is the Zarosian altar, where it will also restore players hitpoints, special attack and run energy as long as at least one Zaros affiliated item is worn. Furthermore, every altar has the option to teleport players outside of the generals lair.

The following altars exist in the dungeon:

  • Zamorak altar near K'ril Tsutsaroth
  • Saradomin altar near Commander Zilyana
  • Bandos altar near General Graardor
  • Armadyl altar near Kree'arra
  • Altar near Nex
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
There are five altars in the [[God Wars Dungeon]], near every general.

Each of these altars can recharge prayer points every 10 minutes, which also gives a +1 prayer bonus for every piece of equipment affiliated to the correct deity. An exception to this is the [[Zaros]]ian altar, where it will also restore players [[hitpoints]], [[special attack]] and [[run energy]] as long as at least one Zaros affiliated item is worn. Furthermore, every altar has the option to teleport players outside of the generals lair.

The following altars exist in the dungeon:

* [[Zamorak altar]] near [[K'ril Tsutsaroth]]
* [[Saradomin altar]] near [[Commander Zilyana]]
* [[Bandos altar]] near [[General Graardor]]
* [[Armadyl altar]] near [[Kree'arra]]
* [[Altar (Ancient Prison)|Altar]] near [[Nex]]
